name: Pair of Round Spooky Tree Links
description:
As seen in Tierracast's 2013 Halloween product launch!

These small round tiles of detailed glazed porcelain are a versatile accent for all of your jewelry creations! Earrings, bracelets, necklaces... these little links fit in anywhere!

The links are sold by the pair and have two holes running front to back. They are approximately 5/8" round and are glazed on both sides.

Please allow for slight variation from the items pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted. Patterns will vary, all are from the same tree stamp.

name: Raven Pendant
description:
As seen in Tierracast's 2013 Halloween product launch!

This hand crafted ceramic pendant was made by rolling porcelain clay into a thin slab, stamping with rubber stamps made from my own designs and cutting into shape. It was fired, glazed front and back, and fired again. I hope you will find an inspired and creative use for it in your jewelry or crafty projects!

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Clock Face Link Pair
description:
These old timey victorian style clock face links are about 5/8" in size with two wire loops. They are glazed in a metallic pewter glaze which covers the back and highlights the details of the clock design on the front. 

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Little Square Key Link Pair
description:
Need just a little touch of antiquity in your jewelry design? These links make great accents for some of the larger Earthenwood key/lock and vintage themed pendants or as a little handmade touch for any jewelry.

The links are approximately 5/8" square, each with two holes running front to back, and are glazed metallic pewter on the back. This listing is for the pair.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Little Keyhole Link Pair
description:
Need just a little touch of antiquity in your jewelry design? These links make great accents for some of the larger Earthenwood key/lock and vintage themed pendants or as a little handmade touch for any jewelry.

The links are approximately 5/8" round, each with two holes running front to back, and are glazed metallic pewter on the back. This listing is for the pair.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Little Round Key Link Pair
description:
Need just a little touch of antiquity in your jewelry design? These links make great accents for some of the larger Earthenwood key/lock and vintage themed pendants or as a little handmade touch for any jewelry.

The links are approximately 5/8" round, each with two holes running front to back, and are glazed metallic pewter on the back. This listing is for the pair.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Pair of Round Floral Scroll Links
description:
These small round tiles of detailed glazed porcelain are a versatile accent for all of your jewelry creations! Earrings, bracelets, necklaces... these little links fit in anywhere!

The links are sold by the pair and have two holes running front to back. They are approximately 5/8" round and are glazed on both sides.

Please allow for slight variation from the items pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted. Patterns will vary, all are from the same large leafy scroll design.

name: Floral Scroll Bracelet Bars
description:
Thin slices of leaf and floral stamped porcelain have been gently curved to form these bracelet bars.  Many stringing options are possible with these gorgeous components, from simple cord or chain to fully beaded bracelets.

Approximately 15x45mm in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the items pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.  Patterns will vary, all are from the same large leafy scroll design.

name: Pair of Square Floral Scroll Links
description:
These small square tiles of detailed glazed porcelain are a versatile accent for all of your jewelry creations!  Earrings, bracelets, necklaces... these little links fit in anywhere!

The links are sold by the pair and have two holes running front to back.  They are approximately 5/8" square and are glazed on both sides.

Please allow for slight variation from the items pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted. Patterns will vary, all are from the same large leafy scroll design.

name: Leafy Tree Pendant
description:
You can almost feel the leaves rustling gently in the wind with this earthy tree pendant.

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Winged Pendant
description:
Fly to new heights with this elegant wing pendant.  This bold and contemporary wing design can combine to make many looks from natural to steampunk.

The wing measures 1 x 2" in size, has a single hole at the top that runs front to back, and is glazed front and back.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Love Birds Pendant
description:
Two adorable curly tailed bird sits on a swirly branch watching over a nest full of eggs in this sweet nature design.

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Birdie Trinket
description:
This design is from the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006.  This popular bird design is popular for all sorts of nature designs.

Each piece is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size.  They are available in several colors and as charms and vertical links with two loops

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Birdnest Trinket
description:
This design is from the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006.  This popular bird nest with three eggs is a cute component for spring or autumn designs, and it matches well with my bird charms and links!

Each piece is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size. They are available as charms and vertical links with two loops

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Fairy Face Bead
description:
These little fairy face beads are small, but they are bursting with mystical cuteness!  These have been a popular bead design of mine since very early in my beadmaking career.

Each bead is individually handcrafted, with the flowers and leaves all applied by hand using tiny bits of clay.  Each bead is glazed in at least 5 colors.  They are approximately 5/8" in size and have a vertical hole for beading.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Small Face Bead Pair
description:
By popular demand, these sleepy little face beads have returned to the website. These cuties are available in the popular fleshy Peachy Tan color and are approximately 12 mm in size with a vertical hole. 

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Set of Small Round Face Stones
description:
Use these flat backed moon face cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

These faces can be seen in Sherry Serafini's beautiful pieces in the book "The Art of Bead Embroidery" (Sherry Serafini and Heidi Kummli)

The stones are approximately 12 mm in size and are sold in sets of four of the same color. 

Also available in a set of six pieces, one of each color.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

options.name: Set of Six, one of each color

name: Medium Round Face Stones
description:
Use these flat backed moon face cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

These faces can be seen in Sherry Serafini's beautiful pieces in the book "The Art of Bead Embroidery" (Sherry Serafini and Heidi Kummli)

The stones are approximately 17 mm in size and are sold in pairs of two of the same color. 

Also available in a set of six pieces, one of each color.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

options.name: Set of Six, one of each color

name: Medium Almond Face Stones
description:
Use these flat backed moon face cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations!  The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

These faces can be seen in Sherry Serafini's beautiful pieces in the book "The Art of Bead Embroidery" (Sherry Serafini and Heidi Kummli)

The stones are approximately 15x22mm in size and are sold in pairs of two of the same color.

Also available in a set of six pieces, one of each color.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

options.name: Set of Six, one of each color

name: Set of Small Almond Face Stones
description:
Use these flat backed moon face cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

These faces can be seen in Sherry Serafini's beautiful pieces in the book "The Art of Bead Embroidery" (Sherry Serafini and Heidi Kummli)

The stones are approximately 10x14 mm in size and are sold in sets of four of the same color.

Also available in a set of six pieces, one of each color.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

options.name: Set of Six, one of each color

This stone is approximately 30 mm in size and is available in several different colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

description:
Use these flat backed moon faced cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

This stone is approximately 30 mm in size and is available in several different colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Large Spiral Face Stone
description:
Use these flat backed moon faced cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

This stone is approximately 30 mm in size and is available in several different colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Large Square Face Stone
description:
Use these flat backed moon faced cabochons for your beadwork, PMC, metalwork, and art doll creations! The faces are undrilled and have no holes, and the backs are unglazed.

This stone is approximately 24 mm in size and is available in several different colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Little Owl Charm
description:
With the popularity of my larger owl pendants, I decided I needed a little baby owl, too.  This charm works well with the other bird and nest charms in the Terra Trinkets line.

Each piece is individually hand made and is just around an inch in size with a single loop at the top and glazed front and back.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Round Owl Pendant
description: Whooo's this? A new addition to my woodland themed Terra Trinkets line! These cute mama owl pendants are individually handcrafted and glazed in a variety of colors. This design is a brand new design I am adding to the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006. Celebrate spring with this cutie, which would be paired nicely with a little birdsnest charm. Each piece is individually hand made. The pendants are available in three belly color choices: tan, sea, and leaf. Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Round Lumber Toggle
description:
This wood grain inspired clasp is a perfect way to finish your favorite earthy jewelry designs. Use it in the front of a necklace as a focal...great with all sorts of earth tones and woodland colors.

The ceramic part of the clasp measures approximately 1" round. It is glazed front and back. The toggle comes with a copper plated metal twig bar and jump rings to attach to your beaded design.

Each piece is hand crafted so please allow for variation in color and "woodgrain"

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Bolted Lumber Link Pair
description:
These house inspired components are a perfect way to finish your favorite earthy jewelry designs. The woodgrain pattern with the screws is inspired by lumber and house construction projects.

Each ceramic link measures approximately 3/4" x 5/8". They have a hole on each end and are glazed front and back.  Each piece is hand crafted so please allow for variation in color and "woodgrain"

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Wooden Door Toggle Clasp
description:
This house inspired clasp is a perfect way to finish your favorite earthy jewelry designs. Use it in the front of a necklace as a focal...great with all sorts of earth tones and wood and stone colors.

The ceramic part of the clasp measures approximately 3/4" x 1 1/2" rectangle. It is glazed front and back. The toggle comes with a copper plated metal key bar.

name: Long Lumber Link
description:
This long link is made from porcelain clay pressed with the texture of detailed woodgrain and glazed with an earthy, woody glaze. They have the look of aged lumber with the durability of ceramic. The link has two holes at the top sides and one at the bottom center.  

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Square Lumber Toggle
description:
This wood grain inspired clasp is a perfect way to finish your favorite earthy jewelry designs. Use it in the front of a necklace as a focal...great with all sorts of earth tones and woodland colors.

The ceramic part of the clasp measures approximately 1" square. It is glazed front and back. The toggle comes with a copper plated metal twig bar and jump rings to attach to your beaded design.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Leafy Tree Necklace Kit
description:
This necklace is a celebration of earthy woodland colors and images featuring forest greens and sandy browns mixed with brass tones.  Bees, dragonflies, and butterflies flutter up the sides of the necklace from the central focus of Leafy Tree pendants and leafy links and charms.

This kit contains all the parts to make the necklace shown and comes with instructions on how to make it.  This beginner's kit is constructed with simple jump ring and eyepin and chain work.  The length of the finished necklace is 20". Tools needed to complete this project are: 2 pairs of chain nose pliers, wire cutters, round nose pliers and a ruler.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Terra Treasures Necklace Kit
description: This is a project I designed for the Fall 2007 issue of Stringing Magazine. It was very popular at the time, so I was pleased to hear the Interweave re-released it in their Best of Stringing: Simply Organic E-Book. It's even the cover image! I have made up some complete kits for this project. Each kit comes with all the handmade beads, seed beads, accents, and waxed linen cord needed to make an (at least) 18" necklace.

name: Acorn Charm
description:
This design is from the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006.  These little acorns are adorably earthy and great for woodsy designs!

Each charm is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size.  The charms are available in two colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Pinecone Charm
description:
This design is from the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006. These little pinecones are adorably earthy and great for woodsy designs!

Each charm is individually hand made and is just about an inch in size. The charms are available in two colors.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Peapod Charm
description:
Don't forget to eat your veggies! Each of these sweet little charms starts out as a little ball of clay, and is hand shaped and textured to look just like a little peapod. They are amazingly detailed, front and back. Great for use for jewelry for new or expecting mothers.

Each charm is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size. 

The price is $8 for each charm, sold individually.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Pumpkin Accent Bead Pairs
description:
This pair pumpkin beads is perfect to accent to the larger Earthenwood pendants and charms for your jewelry designs.

Available in several color choices, the sets come in packages of two handcrafted beads, each just over a half inch in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Wavy Leaf Pendant
description:
Add a little bit of nature to your jewelry designs with these very naturalistic leaf pendants.  Each one has an organic shape and texture, and the glaze choices have been specially chosen to blend with semi precious, wood, and other natural types of beads.

This pendant is approximately 1"w x 1"h in size and comes in several natural color choices.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Veined Leaf Pendant
description:
Add a little bit of nature to your jewelry designs with these very naturalistic leaf pendants.  Each one has an organic shape and texture, and the glaze choices have been specially chosen  to blend with semi precious, wood, and other natural types of beads.

This pendant is approximately 7/8"w x 1"h in size and comes in several natural color choices.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Small Veined Leaf Charm Pair
description:
Add a little bit of nature to your jewelry designs with these very naturalistic leaf charms. Each one has an organic shape and texture, and the glaze choices have been specially chosen to blend with semi precious, wood, and other natural types of beads.

The charms are approximately 5/8"w x 3/4"h in size and come in several natural color choices.  They are sold by the pair.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Small Wavy Leaf Charm Pair
description:
Add a little bit of nature to your jewelry designs with these very naturalistic leaf charms. Each one has an organic shape and texture, and the glaze choices have been specially chosen to blend with semi precious, wood, and other natural types of beads.

The charms are approximately 5/8"w x 5/8"h in size and come in several natural color choices.  They are sold by the pair.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Time Wheel Toggle
description:
Tick Tock, Tick Tock! Capture a slice of time with these handcrafted porcelain components. Metallic glazes decorate the Roman numeral style clock design. This very versatile toggle clasp can be used as a closure for a bracelet or necklace...even as a focal!  See the attached pictures for some ideas on how to use this fun clasp.

This charm is about 28mm round with an approximate 12mm hole. It is glazed in the metallic/bare clay oxidation finish with a metallic pewter bronze glaze on the back and comes with a natural brass etched loop attached,  The toggle bar looks like a clock hand and will come in a dark copper, silver, or brass finish 

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Cherry Charm
description:
It's fruit salad time! Each of these sweet little cherry charms starts out as two little balls of clay and a swirl of high temperature wire. They are amazingly detailed, front and back. Great for a summery pair of earrings!

Each charm is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

The price is $8 for each charm, sold individually.

name: Rose Tattoo Heart Pendant
description:
Inspired by the designs and colors of rose tattoo designs, this pendant has a classic look that appeals to all ages and adapts to many styles.  The pendant is glazed in several colors on the front and the metallic pewter details are repeated in the solid dark pewter back.  There is a single front to back hole at the center of the pendant which measures approximately 1.5 x 2" in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.  As each piece is hand stamped, the placement of the rose and leaves may vary from the pictures shown.

name: Rose Heart Pendant
description:
Inspired by the design of classic rose tattoo designs, this pendant has a classic look that appeals to all ages and adapts to many styles. The pendant is glazed in a solid color with metallic pewter detailing the rose and leaf design. There is a single front to back hole at the center of the pendant which measures approximately 1.5 x 2" in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted. As each piece is hand stamped, the placement of the rose and leaves may vary from the pictures shown.

name: Heart Pendant
description:
This pendant is a simple, sturdy token to show your love. It measures 7/8"w x 1 1/8" in size. It can be used just the way it is for a classic love talisman necklace, or you can add to it to make it fancy!

The Heart Pendant comes in 2 color choices: Candy Red and Pewter

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Flutter Heart Pendant
description:
Let your heart soar with this awesome pendant. The Punky Hearts remind me of the designs I see in punk and rock album artwork and tattoos. I made this line of hearts to be a little more edgy than the traditional valentine hearts, but still fun and sweet.  Match this up with the smaller Punky Heart Flutter Charm Pair for a matching pendant and necklace set!

This chunky pendant is individually hand-crafted.  Sizes will vary slightly, but it is approximately 1-1.5 inches in size.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Sugar Skulls
description:
These sugar skull inspired skulls are approximately an inch in size.  Each one is hand crafted with details added by hand.  Add some punky spice to your designs with these cute and spooky skulls. 

I was inspired to make these charms while watching a documentary about one of my favorite artists, Frida Kahlo. There is a classic graphic skull, a flowered skull, a little red devil, and one that celebrates Frida herself! I have been making these designs for many years, but have recently fine-tuned the designs, so they look a little different than the ones in the past.  They are now mostly glossy black with just the front surface showing the contrasting white and colored details.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Ouch Heart Charm
description:
These jet black, candy red, and white hearts remind me of the designs I see in punk and rock album artwork and tattoos.  I made this line of hearts to be a little more edgy than the traditional valentine hearts, but still fun and sweet.

Each charm is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size. They are available in a variety of punky themed designs, in jet black and candy red.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Swirly Bird Pendant
description:
An adorable curly tailed bird sits on a swirly branch in this sweet nature design.

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Robin Birdie Trinket
description: This design is a brand new design I am adding to the Terra Trinkets line, which I have been making since about 2006. Celebrate spring with this cutie, which would be paired nicely with a little birdsnest charm. Each piece is individually hand made and is just under an inch in size. It is available as a charm or a vertical link with two loops (as shown) Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Kitty Pendant
description:
A quiet kitty sits under a midnight crescent moon in this pendant perfect for a cat lover.

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Openwork Escutcheon Oxidation
description:
As seen in the Winter 2009/2010 issue of Stringing Magazine. Amusing Grace is the name of the project article I wrote for this issue.

This ornate porcelain keyhole cutout pendant is sure to unlock some creative possibilities for your crafty expression. The size is 32mm x 48mm wide (1 1/4" x 1 7/8") This piece is glazed front and back with a rich glaze and has three large holes, two on top and one at the bottom. There is a design on one side, and a solid glaze on the other, so it is reversible for two different looks in one pendant! 
The design may vary slightly from the pendant shown, as each one is individually hand crafted.

name: Pretty Fairy Pendant
description:
Flowers, butterflies, and leaves flow through the hair of this pretty fairy princess.

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Wheelie Link Pair
description:
Yearning for the open road? Use one of these fun retro looking links to make a Road Trip necklace! Coming to you straight from the Motor City.

These links are approximately 5/8" in size and come in several color choices. There are two front to back holes at the sides of each link.

Please allow for slight variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Bicycle Pendant
description:
Celebrate your favorite way to travel with this modern bicycle design! 

This pendant measures about 1" x 2" in size. It is glazed front and back and has a top hole running front to back.

Please allow for variation from the item pictured, as each piece is individually hand crafted.

name: Qwerty Charms
description:
Inspired by old typewriter keys, these graphic charms can be used to make personalized jewelry.  Use an alphabet letter to symbolize your name or pick a lucky number.  Use the "&" to join things together or the "?" to show your confusion!

This charm is about 28mm round. It is glazed in the metallic/bare clay oxidation finish with a metallic bronze glaze on the back.  Pick your letter, number, or symbol from the drop down menu.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.

name: Heartfire Necklace Kit
description:
As seen in Creative Jewelry, 2011!

Create your own Heart Fire necklace like the one shown with this romantic bead kit. This listing contains all the supplies and instructions you need to make the necklace shown.

The Heart Fire necklace is made with a handcrafted ceramic heart pendant and link and is accented with velvety red faceted glass, copper plated pewter components, and gunmetal black details. 

The finished necklace measures 18" and is a suitable project for a beginner. Tools needed to complete this project are: 2 pairs of chain nose pliers, crimping tool, and ruler.

Please allow for variations in this hand crafted item. Shipped item may vary slightly from photograph.
